definitions.definition: Often said of children : to report incriminating information about another person, or a person's wrongdoing in an annoying fashion, usually to a person in a position of authority over the accused person; to tell on somebody.
To speak like a baby or young child ; to babble , to prattle ; to speak haltingly ; to stutter .

secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , Canada , US , derogatory ) Often said of children : to report incriminating information about another person, or a person's wrongdoing in an annoying fashion, usually to a person in a position of authority over the accused person; to tell on somebody. [from late 15th c.]
( intransitive , obsolete ) To speak like a baby or young child ; to babble , to prattle ; to speak haltingly ; to stutter .
